fields.name: msgOnboarding
fields.fieldText:
Good Onboarding Sets the Tone

We're glad you're here to help guide your New Hires!


Getting your new team members off to a good start sets the tone for the rest of their time on your team. According to the Society for Human Resource Management (SHRM), onboarding is a prime opportunity for employers to win the hearts and minds of new employees.


New hires who experience badly planned and executed onboarding may conclude that the organization is poorly managed and decide that it was a mistake to take the job. This is particularly true of impressionable Millennials who may be new to the workforce and unclear about what to expect. Rather than setting new employees up for success, organizations with poor onboarding processes are setting the stage for an early exit. Nearly one-third of all new hires quit their jobs within the first six months.
